name: SURVIVE ANOTHER NIGHT
description:
A game I made for the 2020 Epic MegaJam. 

The theme was "It's been a long time, but we're not done yet". It was a 7-day jam and I decided to make a game about a zombie apocalypse. You play a character trying to protect his family for one last night before help arrives.

PREPARE - FIGHT - PROTECT - SURVIVE

CONTROLS:
Move = W, A, S, D
Look Around = Mouse Movement
Interact/Attack = Left Mouse Button
Combat Mode (HOLD) = Right Mouse Button
Toggle Family Movement = Spacebar
Pause Menu = Esc
